title: Shyvanna - HELP
body:
when ever i play shyvanna, or even play against a shyvanna i get extreme lag ingame! Other wise any other champions are perfectly fine and dont lag at all

anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
That's really strange. Do you see a dip in your FPS or latency (ping) or is it entirely visual with no identifiers? 

Sometimes, performance can be pretty janky if there are missing assets for a specific champion. I'd recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) just to ensure this isn't the case. 

Let me know if you continue to see this after the repair.

Sorry havn't been on recently, but yes my ping goes up from 50 to mid 60's/70's, but i have repairing and the problem is still their some of my friends just think its more on my end with my shitty computer

Gotcha. So with latency (ping) changes, your connection is taking differing lengths of time to communicate with the server. This can be caused by a number of different factors, but the most important and likely are either your route to the server or local network settings that conflict with League.

I recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in finding a permanent solution for this. Let me know if those steps caused any change.
